thread.section_title: Dior US Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Dior US | dior-us.com | 6 of 95
thread.title: Erinn Justice
thread.title_full: Dior US reviewed by Erinn Justice

author: Erinn Justice
title: Erinn Justice
text: I got my husband the Sauvage gift set for Valentine's Day.I think I ordered it on Friday or Saturday and I was worried it wouldn't arrive by Tueday (Vday).They offered free over night shipping,gift packaging,and a personalized message card...all for FREE!My package arrived Vday morning and my husband absolutely smells amazing and loved the gift set!Ordering was very easy and all the extra complimentary goodies were an unexpected added bonus.I will definitely make more purchases especially since the prices are better than most retail stores!Thank you Dior for making my Valentine's simple and amazing!!!!
